means: <美口>庞大的数字，无法计算的大数字

sentence.Network_en: It's been a zillion years since I've seen her.
sentence.Network_cn: 我已经有很多年没见过她了。

sentence.Network_en: There is one keyhole and about a zillion keys.
sentence.Network_cn: 这里只有一个钥匙孔,却有无数把钥匙.

sentence.Network_en: She's a zillion times brainier than I am.

是杰灵(ZILLION)的2008-02-10 23:54 zlhqqzlh |四级采纳率18% 擅长：暂未定制等待您来回答分享到：    来百度推广Windows  精彩知识.

list.abs: zillion ways to admire , love and honor him !无数方式敬佩，爱并且尊敬他！

derivation.yuyuan_name: 1940s: from Z (perhaps as a symbol of an unknown quantity) + million

entry.tran: 极大的数目;庞大的数量
entry.def: If you talk about a zillion people or things, you are emphasizing that there is an extremely large number of them.

example.ex: It's been a zillion years since I've seen her.
example.tran: 我已经有很多年没见过她了。

auth_sentence.content: Most of the ten zillion condos were empty.
auth_sentence.res_content: Most of the ten zillion condos were empty.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Most of the ten zillion condos were empty.

auth_sentence.content: It's surrounded by a zillion hipster restaurants that get tons of drooling press.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's surrounded by a zillion hipster restaurants that get tons of drooling press.

auth_sentence.content: Sorry, all, did not mean to do make my point Several Zillion times.
